description: Dalgona Challenges - Flask-based XSS challenge training platform running on Python 2.7.18 with Werkzeug 1.0.1
notes: Security concerns: Python 2.7.18 is EOL (end-of-life since 2020), Werkzeug 1.0.1 is outdated. /xss2 endpoint exists but returns 500 Internal Server Error. Application appears to be intentionally vulnerable for training purposes. Only accepts GET, HEAD, OPTIONS methods.
